attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to have an officially recognised day in appreciation of the black country named "black country day"
in honour of industrial contributions made by the good people of the black country.
we feel that we fueled and spear-headed the industrial revolution and would like to be remembered for it. we are very proud of our heritage and who we are please do us this honour

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
